messages.content: What bothers me is not the fact that someone disagrees with my lifestyle, it's that they constantly go on and on about..that would annoy anyone.
RNG-based access to very important mechanics is frustrating for some people.
Yeah that's what I just got. Fkin annoying.
I suppose it is quite frustrating to have someone telling you the sky isn't blue
Every time I get a staff kill, it feels like seeing a shooting star <3 Yeah, it definitely sucks.
Is that [NAME] as the commentator? EDIT: just finished the video, feel stupid now
Right now it sucks ass I gotta squat in snow in the freezing cold in the back yard of my apartment complex holding a little bong
"one of us will be right!" Or...ya both wrong and wasted your energy being dumb asses instead of enjoying it.
> This is just a waste of time. Just like making portland denizens use their tax dollars to built a stadium
[NAME] what a dork you are to think the above comment means I am daft to the behavior endured by women for way too long.
The only ignorant person here is you, and the Pope who makes the same baseless claims as you.
The thing to understand about [NAME] is that he's a complete moron.
You really don't comprehend anything my man, now do you? Goodness gracious the amount of stupidity.
You get her off 3 times and she doesn't finish you? That seems very selfish.
[NAME], learn some fucking grammar and punctuation. Maybe use some paragraphs. Just an idea.
If I had that I’d stop working and travel full time. I do not understand the avarice of the wealthy. It makes no fucking sense.
I think it's normal. Don't analyse how you look like and worry about it btw, those idiots sure don't when they say their bullshit
Organs are literal superfoods and it weirds me out there hasn't been some fad diet with them yet.
Yea, very rude. Avoid anything with a strong smell like fish and popcorn, curry is just as strong.
